data.text: @Arxareon More power to you then, but I’d rather live in a world where blizz lies rather than one where SL is their best effort…..

@that_kind_oforc I absolutely believe it though. Is it right? Absolutely not. I would've loved to see us spending more time with many characters. Not just surface level cameos and stuff, go deeper.
The main arcs were laid out but it would've been awesome if there was a lot more meat on there.
@that_kind_oforc If this was always the plan then the downgrade from Kul’Tiras and Zuldazzar to Orbios is even more baffling
@that_kind_oforc Wow players deserve a new game director.  Man is out of his depth and ego is so big he won't admit to anything wrong 📉📉📉
@that_kind_oforc Baine I actually could believe horde has not been treated well for a long time
@that_kind_oforc I really like Ion but yeah that answer was pretty whack

@Velgrub @that_kind_oforc "Yes, we intended to provide our customers with an inferior, unpolished, terminally-flawed product. We meant to give less value for their money and maintain subs with addictive gambling mechanics. Leaving many plot threads unresolved was intentional. This was the plan all along."

@that_kind_oforc What a fucking liar, dude. What a fucking, weaselly little, liar, dude. What a fucking, weaselly little LIAR, dude. Holy shit, dude. Holy fucking shit, dude. Literally lying, STILL LYING...
